profile.headline: Building at the intersection of AI and growth.
profile.bio:
With 20 years spanning business development, strategic partnerships, and go-to-market leadership, I've had the privilege of driving transformative revenue growth at the world's largest cloud company.

As Global Business Development Lead for Generative AI at Amazon Web Services, I architect partnerships with enterprise technology leaders like SAP and Databricks â€” deals that have collectively driven over $1 billion in annual recurring revenue.

Currently completing my Executive MBA at Columbia Business School, I write about what the AI revolution means for revenue leaders, sales organizations, and the future of B2B growth.

experience.title: Global Business Development Lead, Generative AI
experience.description: Architecting partnerships with enterprise technology leaders like SAP and Databricks, driving over $1B in ARR.
